definitions.text: the act of creating something by casting it in a mold
a decorative strip used for ornamentation or finishing
a decorative recessed or relieved surface on an edge
a preliminary sculpture in wax or clay from which a finished work can be copied
become moldy; spoil due to humidity
examples: The furniture molded in the old house

definitions.text: form by pouring (e.g., wax or hot metal) into a cast or mold
make something, usually for a specific function
examples: She molded the rice balls carefully
Work the metal into a sword

definitions.text: fit tightly, follow the contours of
examples: The dress molds her beautiful figure

definitions.text: shape or influence; give direction to
